SA25n2908:2: caraṇambhyoduhadvayaṃ| sādhakānāṃ [1] ca siddhyarthaṃ likhayate balimālikā|
SA25n2908:3: yenaiva balidadena srīṇaitāḥ sarvajantavaḥ| rakṣacakrādikaṃ sarvaṃ śobhanaṃ|
SA25n2908:4: bodhanaṃ tataḥ| balitatvaṃ mama krite jñātavyaṃ sādhusammataiḥ||
SA25n2908:6: vaśyābhicārikaṃ tathā| balyupahāḍamātreṇa sādhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ| māyā
SA25n2908:7: sumatisihena granthitā balimālikā| cintāmaṇirivābhātikaṇthastha mantrināṃ sadā|
SA25n2908:8: atra subāhutantroktagāthābhir balikaṃ srijetāḥ| piṭakaiḥ śakatair bhārair
SA25n2908:9: antośo'ñjalibhis tathā| tatvaikatra baliñ ca'rghaṃ gandhatoyādikavad etad
SA25n2908:10: evāsuraḥ| sarvabhujaṃ gasiddhāstārkṣaḥ suparṇṇaḥ kaṭapūtanāś ca||
SA25n2908:12: ca ye ke vibhūmauni vasanti divyāḥ| 'nyastaikajānuḥ| vrithipītalehaṃ
SA25n2908:13: kritāñjalir vijñāpayāmi tāṃs tāna| saputradāraiḥ sahabhrityāsaṃghaiḥ|
SA25n2908:14: śrutvā-ihāyantv anugrahārthāṃ| ye me tu priṣṭhi nivasanti bhūtāyo nandane ye ca
SA25n2908:15: surādayeṣu| ye codāyās taṃ girim antareṣu nāgeṣu sarveṣu ca ye vasanti| sarisu
SA25n2908:16: sarvāsu ca saṃgameṣu ratnālaye ca' pi kritādhvāsaḥ| vāpi taṭākeṣu ca sālpaleṣu
SA25n2908:17: kūpeṣu vajreṣu ca nirjhareṣu| ye grāmaghoṣe surakānane ca śūnyālaye devagriheṣu
SA25n2908:18: ye ca vihāracaityavasathāśrameṣu matheṣu śālāsu ca kuñjarānāṃ| ye bhūbhritāṃ citramriheva
SA25n2908:19: santirathyāsu vīthīṣu ca catvareṣu|ye [2] caikavrikṣeṣu mahāpatheṣu
SA25n2908:21: siṃhe bharikṣāddhyuṣitāsu ye ca vasanti ghorāsu mahāṭavīṣu||
SA25n2908:23: kritālayaś ca merau śmāśāneni vasanti yo ca| hriṣṭāpasannaḥ| prajāgandhamālyaṃ
SA25n2908:24: dhūpaṃ baliṃ dīpavardhañ ca bhaktya| grihṇantu bhuñjantu pipantu cedam idañ ca
SA25n2908:26: (1) oṃ vajrayoginī hrīḥ| tu ña| khaḥ pheṃ ña a ña|
SA25n2908:27: mama manaḥ siddha prayaccha baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā|
SA25n2908:30: sarvarogapraśamani sarvabhayavināśini idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha khāhi
SA25n2908:31: khāhi| sarvaduṣta mārana mārana vandha vandha| hana hana| daha daha| paca paca|
SA25n2908:32: māraya māraya| hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| parṇaśavaribaliḥ|
SA25n2908:33: (3) oṃ mahākālāśāsano bakāriṇe| paścimakālo yam idaṃ
SA25n2908:34: ratnatrayābakarināṃ| yadi pratijñāṃ samarasi tadā| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa kha
SA25n2908:35: kha khāhi khāhi| sarvaduṣṭasatvāna māra māra| grihṇa grihṇa| bandha bandha|
SA25n2908:36: hana hana| daha daha| paca paca| dīnam ekena māraya māraya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ
SA25n2908:38: (4) oṃ āḥ hūṃ hoḥ uṣṇīṣa sumbharāja| yamāntaka
SA25n2908:39: prajñāntaka padmātaka vighnāntaka acala ḍakkirāja nīladaṇḍa mahābalebhyaḥ|
SA25n2908:40: saparivarebhyaḥ idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dipañ cākṣataṃ dadāmahe| te
SA25n2908:41: cāgatya saparivarāḥ śīghram idaṃ baliṃ grihṇantu khādantu| pipantu jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ
SA25n2908:42: hoḥ santuṣṭvā mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu
SA25n2908:43: hūṃ [3] hūṃ phaṭ pahṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā| daśakrodhabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:45: kṣetrapālebhyo'nyabhays ca idaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ| dhūpaṃ dīpam akṣataṃ dadāmahe|
SA25n2908:46: te ca gatyasaparivāraḥ śīghram idaṃ baliṃ grihṇantu khādantu pipantu jaḥ hūṃ
SA25n2908:47: vaṃ hoḥ santuṣṭvā mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣavaraṇa guptiṃ kurvantu
SA25n2908:48: hūṃ hūṃ| phaṭ phaṭ| vajradhara ajñāpayati svāhā| kṣetrapālabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:50: samyaksaṃbuddhāya| tad yathā| oṃ suru suru| prasuru prasuru| tara tara| bhara
SA25n2908:51: bhara| sambhara sambhara| santarpaya santarpaya| sarvapretānī svāhā| apasarantvapataraprakṣiṇo
SA25n2908:52: dadāmy ahaṃ sarvalokadhātunivāsināṃ pretānām āhāramite| pretabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:55: dāpayāma idaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhanaivedyai disaṃ yuktaṃ grihitvā
SA25n2908:56: sukhasaumanyasya| lābhino bhavantu| sthānāñ ca nirupadrapaṃ kurvantu|
SA25n2908:57: sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānena te oṃ āḥ hūṃ| idam amritapiṇḍabhuktvā mama sarvastvānāñ
SA25n2908:58: ca śāntiṃ kurvantu svasti svāhā| samājikānāṃ sarvabhautibaliḥ|
SA25n2908:60: grihṇantu baliṃ viśiṣṭaṃ| agnir yamo nairriti bhūpatiś ca| apāṃpatir
SA25n2908:61: vāyudhanapatiś ca| īśānabhūtādhipatiś ca| devāsūrdhvaṃ ca candrārkapitamahaś
SA25n2908:62: ca| devāḥ samastābhūmi ye ca nāgādharaguhyagaṇaiḥ sametāḥ pratipattidvaikanivedañ
SA25n2908:63: ca svakasvakasv eva deśasubhūtāḥ grihṇantuṣṭhaḥ| savamāḥ
SA25n2908:64: sapenyāpaputramitrasvajanaiḥ sametāḥ| [4] puṣpaṃ baliṃ dhūpaṃnivedanañ ca
SA25n2908:65: bhuñjantu jighrantu pipantu cedam idaṃ ca karmmasaphalaṃ yuṣantu| dikpālabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:66: (9) oṃ pheṃ hrīṃ hū jaḥ baliṃ raktapuṣpakāmarājasarvasiddha
SA25n2908:67: prayaccha mama'p ituttha cittakāna bhasmi kuru| saptapātālagataśatrūna
SA25n2908:68: pādatalaṃ kuru| sarvajanopaśāntiṃ kuru phaṭ svāhā| kāmarājabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:69: (10) oṃ hrīḥ ehy ehi ekajaṭīmamopanyutāna| śāntiṃ kuru
SA25n2908:70: puṣṭiṃ kuru mahāyakṣādhipataye idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa grihṇa paya grihṇa
SA25n2908:71: paya| paravidyāṃ ākarṣaya ākarṣaya| truṭa truṭa| muṭa muṭa| hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ
SA25n2908:73: (11) oṃ āḥ hrīṃ hrīṃ kurukulle| sarvasatvavaśaṃ kari
SA25n2908:74: sarvabhayabhayaṃ kari idaṃ bali gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dipañ cākṣataṃ dāmahe
SA25n2908:76: khādatha sivatha jighatha mama naḥ naḥ siddhiṃ prayacchatha oṃ āḥ| hrīṃ hrīṃ
SA25n2908:80: kritaśekharāya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama sarvavighnāna ca turmārānani
SA25n2908:81: vāraya vāraya| trāsaya trāsaya| bhrama bhrama| chinda chinda| bhinda bhinda|
SA25n2908:82: nāśa nāśa| tāpa tāpa| śoṣa śoṣa| ccheda ccheda| bheda bheda| duṣṭasatvāna mama
SA25n2908:83: viruddhācittakāna bhasmi kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| caṇḍamahāroṣaṇabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:85: mahāyakṣasenāpataye| idaṃ baliṃ pañcamritaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi
SA25n2908:86: khāhi| samayam anusmara| jaḥ jaḥ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| jambhalabaliḥ| [5]
SA25n2908:89: raktābharaṇabhūṣitāya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama sarvavighnāna hara hara|
SA25n2908:90: caturmārānani| vāraya vāraya| trāsaya trāsaya| bhrama bhrama| chinda chinda|
SA25n2908:91: vinda vinda| nāṣaya nāṣaya| śoṣaya śoṣaya| cinda cinda| bheda bheda| hūṃ hūṃ
SA25n2908:92: phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| paścata pratyaṃśena cārayeta| indrāya namaḥ hrīḥ yamāya namaḥ
SA25n2908:93: strīḥ varuṇāya namaḥ vi kuverāya namaḥ kri agnaye namaḥ ta| īsvarāyanamaḥ ā
SA25n2908:94: nairritaye namaḥ navāyave namaḥ na| candāya namaḥ hūṃ| arkāya namaḥ hūṃ|
SA25n2908:95: brahmamaṇe namaḥ phaṭ| vasudhārayai namaḥ phaṭ| avilamacitriṇi namaḥ svāhā|
SA25n2908:96: sarvabhūtebhyo namaḥ svāhā| ha hā hi hu hū hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| raktayamāribaliḥ|
SA25n2908:100: bhagavati durgatte| riṇi āgaccha āgaccha| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama
SA25n2908:101: sarvaśatrūna hana hana| khāhi khāhi| sarvabandhanavyādhigrahāna daha daha|
SA25n2908:102: bhedaya bhedaya| phoṭaya phoṭaya| sphoṭaya sphoṭaya| sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha
SA25n2908:103: śāntiṃ puṣtiṃ rakṣaṃ me kuru sarvakali kalahavi grahavi| vadavighnorvādavyaktikarāṃś
SA25n2908:104: cchindaś cchinda bhanda bhanda| bhañjaya bhañjaya| kṣobhaya kṣobhaya| stambhaya
SA25n2908:105: stambhaya| hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ| hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ| āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| durgottārābaliḥ|
SA25n2908:106: (16) oṃ vajrāralli hoḥ vajraḍākinyaḥ samayas tvaṃ
SA25n2908:107: driśya hoḥ vajrāñjalye ūrdhavikacayābaliṃ davyātani sādhake| oṃ kha kha| [6]
SA25n2908:109: baliṃ grihṇantu samayarakṣantu mama sarvasiddhiṃ prayacchanta yathaivaṃ
SA25n2908:110: yatheṣṭi| bhuñjatha khādatha| pipatha| jighratha| mātikramatha| mama
SA25n2908:111: sarvākāratayā| satsukha| vipriddhaye sahāyakā bhavantu hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā|
SA25n2908:114: mahācaṇḍavajrapāṇaye mama sarvaśatrūnāṃ sarvagātrāṇi saṃkocaya saṃkocaya|
SA25n2908:115: bhañjaya bhañjaya| moṭaya moṭaya| bhagavati vajraśrīṃkhale| vajrapāṇi nākacūrya
SA25n2908:116: ākarṣaya ākarṣaye| cakṣurvandha śirovandha sarvagātraṇi tāraya māraya puṣpaṃ
SA25n2908:117: dhūpaṃ gandhaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa svāhā| vajraśrīṃkhalābaliḥ|
SA25n2908:118: (18) oṃ vajravārāhi idaṃ baliṃ kha kha| khāhi khāhi|
SA25n2908:120: samayarakṣantu yathaivaṃ yathaiṣṭaṃ bhuñjatha khādatha pipatha jighratha
SA25n2908:121: mātikramatha mama sarvākāratayā satsukha vaṃ vriddhaye sahāyakā bhavantu hūṃ
SA25n2908:124: sarvabhayahare idaṃ baliṃ pañcāmritaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāni|
SA25n2908:125: sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭana mama krite stambhaya stambhaya| mohāya mohāya vandāya
SA25n2908:126: vandāya| hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ| sarvaduṣṭastambhani vajratāre svāhā|
SA25n2908:129: namaḥ samantasaṃghānāṃ| oṃ sitātapatra| oṃ vimala| oṃ śaṃkara| oṃ
SA25n2908:132: yena kena citritaṃ tat sarvāna cchinda cchinda bhinda bhinda| cira cira| giri
SA25n2908:133: giri| mara mara| hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ|
SA25n2908:140: lokadhātvanantavyūhaprasaragaganasamāḥ sarvalokapālāḥ sarvasatvāñ ca tad yathā|
SA25n2908:143: vemacitrivrithividevitāḥ saparivārā idaṃ baliṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ| naivedyādikaṃ
SA25n2908:145: manuṣyāna manuṣyāna jambhayata stambhayata| bhandayata| vidhvansayata| mama
SA25n2908:147: bodhimaṇḍaparyantaṃ ḍhaukayata mama sahāyavyāṃ| śāntiṃ puṣṭaṃ rakṣāñ ca kuru oṃ
SA25n2908:148: āḥ mañjuvajra maṃ hūṃ svāhā| mañjuvajravāgiśvarabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:150: sarvaśābaripūrike bhāgavati varade namaste namaste punar api punar api namaste
SA25n2908:151: mama devimātar anugraha kuru idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa|   oṃ vajravairocanīye svāhā| acalakalpokto
SA25n2908:153: (23) oṃ sarvatathāgatasamayam anusmara hūṃ hūṃ| pheṃ
SA25n2908:154: pheṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| rakṣāgagana kṣepabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:155: (24) oṃ vajraḍākini idaṃ baliṃ hrī hrī| ha haiṃ haṃ
SA25n2908:156: hiḥ| phaṭ mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru svāhā| aṣṭamrācaturddaśyāni yame
SA25n2908:158: (25) oṃ vajraḍākini idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| ha ha ha
SA25n2908:159: haḥ kha kha kha kha| ya ya ya ya| a a a aḥ| mama siddhiṃ prayaccha hūṃ phaṭ
SA25n2908:163: pradāyamañjubuddhisiddhidadāya idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ madhu|
SA25n2908:164: śarkarādisahitaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khādi khādi| mama śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ
SA25n2908:165: rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kuru kuru| oṃ āḥ dhīḥ hūṃ svāhā| a-ra-pa-ca-na-baliḥ|
SA25n2908:166: (27) oṃ mahāśrīyetrī hūṃ hrī oṃ idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa
SA25n2908:167: grihṇa| trailokyasaṃsārāya dārivyāgajaṃ vidāraya sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭana bhañja
SA25n2908:168: bhañja| agaccha agaccha| bhagavati mama nidhiṃ dehi svāhā| mahāśrītārābaliḥ|
SA25n2908:169: (28) oṃ bhagavati aṣṭamahā| bhayatāriṇi śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ
SA25n2908:171: ca rakṣāṃ kuru aṣṭamahādāruṇabhayebhyas tāraya tāraya| divyarūpiṇi saume mukhi
SA25n2908:172: idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| svāhā| aṣṭamahābhayatārabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:173: (29) oṃ bhagavati cchin namaste praśaste| oṃ
SA25n2908:175: vajravairocaṇīye idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa kha kha| khāhi khāhi| mama
SA25n2908:176: viruddhacittakāna bhasmi kuru saptapātālagataśatrūna pādatalaṃ kuru sarvatra
SA25n2908:177: mama śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā|
SA25n2908:181: baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| sarvaduṣṭasatādamaka| ha hā hi hī hu
SA25n2908:182: hū he hai ho hau haṃ haḥ phaṭ svāhā| oṃ vajramahākālabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:184: yogaśatasahasrakāra idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ grihṇa grihṇa yena
SA25n2908:185: kena cin mama yantramantratantraviṣacūrṇaprayagādikaṃ kritaṃ kāritaṃ tat sarvaṃ
SA25n2908:186: hana hana| daha daha| paca paca| matha matha| garja garja| tarja tarja|
SA25n2908:189: mahāmāyurimahāśītavani mahāmantrānusārini buddhiś caiva mahātmāno vidyādevyo
SA25n2908:190: mahābaliḥ| māmakībhrikutī caiva tārāvitāthāṃ kuśīvajraśriṃkhalāśvetā tathaiva
SA25n2908:191: ca| mahākālī ca dūtya'pi ca vajradūtyas tathā baliḥ| supāśīvajrapāśā ca
SA25n2908:193: aparājitāmahādevīkālakarṇīmahābalā| tathā dhanye mahābhāgāpadmakuṇḍalir eva ca|
SA25n2908:194: puṣpadaṇḍīmaṇicūḍāsvanyakeśī ca piṃgalā| mahātejā tathā devī dhanyā ca vidyun
SA25n2908:196: mahābhāgādhanyāladkeśvarī tathā| anyāś ca bahavo vidyāḥ satvānugrakārikāḥ| tad
SA25n2908:197: yathā| kālikarālikumbhāṇḍiśaṃkhini| kamalākṣi| [10] hārīti| harikeṣi| śrīmati|
SA25n2908:198: haripiṅgale| lambe| pralambe| kālapāśe| kalaśodari| yamadūti| yamarākṣasi|
SA25n2908:199: bhūtagrasani| pratīcchemaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ baliṃ ca dāsyāmaṃ rakṣī
SA25n2908:200: kuru mama sarvasatvānāñ ca sarvabhayo padravebhyo jāvatu| parṣaśataṃ paśyatu
SA25n2908:203: mahāśvete| mahānīlaratnapadgajapustakahaste idaṃ baliṃ pañcāmritaṃ bhuñja
SA25n2908:204: jighra| oṃ picu picu| prajñāvardhani| jvala jvala| medhāvardhani| dhiri dhiri|
SA25n2908:205: buddhi vardhani svāhā| oṃ śrutismritivijaye| dhīḥ dhāraṇīye svāhā| prajñāpāramitābaliḥ|
SA25n2908:207: śrutismritimahāvijaye svāhā| sarvayakṣiṇi sametā śīghram āgacchantu| idaṃ baliṃ
SA25n2908:208: grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| oṃ dharaṇi dharaṇi svāhā| vasudhārabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:210: sarvārtha sādhani| sarvasatvāṃ śaṅkari| imaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha|
SA25n2908:211: khāhi khāhi| hūm phāṭ hrīṃ hrīṃ svāhā| prasannatārabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:213: cālaya| saṃghaṭṭaya| mattamātaṃge| avidhehe| idaṃ baliṃ bhuñja jighra oṃ jāḥ
SA25n2908:217: trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ satyanadevādikam| ye cānye samayena tiṣṭhate tānavabhuṣisvāmi
SA25n2908:218: śīghram idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| [11] oṃ mala mala| tulu tulu| mulu mulu| culu
SA25n2908:219: culu| dhama dhama| radga radga| radgapaya radgapaya| pūraya pūraya| āśāṃ me
SA25n2908:222: (38) oṃ dhvajāgrakeyūre| jaya jaya| vijaya vijaya|
SA25n2908:223: jayāvahini| mama sarvaśatrūṃ jambhaya jambhaya| stambhaya stambhaya| matha
SA25n2908:224: matha| grasa grasa| hūṃ rakṣa rakṣa māṃ bhagavāṃ| imaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa|
SA25n2908:225: bhañja bhañja| parasainyaṃ vidhvansāya vidhvansāya| śatrūna śatrūna cala cala
SA25n2908:226: cili cili| tulu tulu| gala gala| kili kili| kulu kulu| sarvatathāgatāvalokite
SA25n2908:227: svāhā| guṇarājaprābhāse svāhā| candrārkavimale svāhā| sarvanakṣatracamikariṇe
SA25n2908:228: svāhā| rakṣa rakṣa| sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ svāhā| dhvajāgrakeyūrabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:229: (39) oṃ namo bhagavati uṣṇiṣavijaye mama mrityu nāśaya
SA25n2908:230: nāśaya| vināśaya vināśaya| vidhvansāya vidhvansāya| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa|
SA25n2908:231: dirghāyuṣka me kuru svāsti svāhā| uṣṇiṣavijayābaliḥ|
SA25n2908:233: nīlotpalahastāya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa titā babhujya śānti kuru sarvasiddhaṃ
SA25n2908:234: kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ| siddhaikavīrabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:237: sarvamārabalavināśanāya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama vighnāna hara hara
SA25n2908:238: caturmārāṇa nivāraya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| yamāntakabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:240: baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| mama sarvavighnāna ccheda ccheda|
SA25n2908:241: bheda bheda| drutaṃ| daha daha| paca paca| [12] matha matha| āḥ vighnāntakrita
SA25n2908:246: śīghraṃ āgaccha āgaccha| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama sarvavighnāna hara
SA25n2908:247: hara| śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāñ ca me kuru hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| grahamātrikābaliḥ|
SA25n2908:251: dugdhādisahitaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| māṃ sarvasatvāś ca narakādiduḥkhād uttaraya khād
SA25n2908:252: uttaraya| uddhara| uddhara| samuddhara samuddhara| buddhasatyena dharmasatyena
SA25n2908:253: saṃghasatyena satyavāde satyena oṃ āḥ hriḥ hūm phaṭ svāhā| sarvalokeśvarabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:256: dugdhādisahitaṃ grihitvā babhujya śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāñ ca me kuru oṃ āḥ hrīḥ
SA25n2908:261: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāvaya oṃ āḥ sugatavajratuṣṭya hoḥ hūṃ svāhā|
SA25n2908:265: aṣṭamahābhaya hare khaḍgāñjanapādukabhadraghaṭāni siddhide| bhagavati tāre idaṃ
SA25n2908:266: baliṃ pañcāmritaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| mama mrityuṃ nāśaya nāśaya| oṃ tāre tuttāre
SA25n2908:270: grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| mahāvasuma me dehi dadāya svāhā|
SA25n2908:272: (49) oṃ āḥ hrīṃ hūṃ śuklaikajaṭī idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa
SA25n2908:273: grihṇa| ghāṭaya sarvaduṣṭāna hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| sarvamārabalavināśanāśārthaṃ
SA25n2908:277: nānopakaraṇaduḥkhasahitaṃ grihṇa grihṇa| kha kha| khāhi khāhi| mama na siddhiṃ
SA25n2908:278: prayaccha oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| nāgabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:281: divyagandhavarṇarasopetaṃ upabhujya māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca saṃsāduḥkhārṇavāt
SA25n2908:282: saṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyasi| oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| maitreyabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:285: svāhā| idaṃ baliṃ bhuñja jigha phulladhūpamāṃ sapiṃgha ammasappa
SA25n2908:286: sādhakhāntikhuṇi-phaṭagāda hūṃ svāhā| oṃ akāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ
SA25n2908:287: ādyanutpannatvāna oṃ [14] āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| śrīherukabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:288: (53) oṃ sahajasamvara āḥ hūṃ āgaccha āgaccha śīghraṃ
SA25n2908:289: idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| bhuktvā triptiṃ kritvā sarvasatvānāṃ śāntiṃ kritvā
SA25n2908:291: (54) oṃ tāre sarvebhya hare mama krite duṣṭa|
SA25n2908:292: sarvaduṣṭasatvāna jambhaya jambhaya| mohaya mohaya| mama śāntiṃ kuru|
SA25n2908:293: sarvavighnaśāntiṃ kare prakritaṃ prabhāsvare idaṃ baliṃ pañcāmritaṃ grihṇa
SA25n2908:294: grihṇa| kha kha khāhi khāhi| puṣṭiṃ kuru rakṣavaraṇaguptiṃ kuru sarvasiddhim me
SA25n2908:295: prayaccha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ| sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭastambhanitāre svāhā|
SA25n2908:297: (55) oṃ vajraghaṇṭe āḥ vajraghaṇṭe raṇi raṇi| praraṇa praraṇa|
SA25n2908:299: vajrasatvahridaye santoṣanakari hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| saddharmapāṭhārthaṃ
SA25n2908:300: ghaṇṭaṃ vādayannena mantrena dadyāta| dīpadhūpaṃ gandhanaivedy apuṣpatāmbūlaṃ
SA25n2908:301: ca yathāvidhim ādātabyaṃ| tataḥ krito vaḥ sarvasatvārtha ityādinā| oṃ
SA25n2908:303: (56) oṃ brahmādyā devatāḥ sarve indrādya| mama
SA25n2908:304: rakṣakāḥ nāgagandharvayakṣāś ca saṃtuṣṭā balinā sadā| oṃ akāro mukhaṃ
SA25n2908:305: sarvadharmāṇāṃ ādyanutpannatvāna oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā| sarvakārmikabaliḥ|
SA25n2908:311: vidāraṇi mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru sarvadeva
SA25n2908:313: paca matha matha vidhvānsaya mahāsāhasrapramardani idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa maṃ
SA25n2908:314: sarvastvāś ca rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| mahāsāhasrapramardinibaliḥ|
SA25n2908:316: śāntiṃ kuru puṣṭiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru
SA25n2908:318: daha daha| māraya māraya| garjaya garjaya| idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa| māṃ
SA25n2908:319: sarvasatvāś ca rakṣa rakṣa| hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| mahāmāyuribaliḥ|
SA25n2908:321: mama sarvastvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru puṣṭiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru bhūtapretapiśācādinā
SA25n2908:322: māraya māraya kāraya kāraya tarjaya tarjaya idaṃ baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa rakṣa
SA25n2908:323: rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā| mahāśītavanibaliḥ|
SA25n2908:325: grihṇa grihṇa [16] mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru puṣṭiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru
SA25n2908:326: bhūtapretapiśācādinā māraya māraya mardaya māṃ sarvasatvāś ca rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ
SA25n2908:329: baliṃ grihṇa grihṇa mama sarvasatvānāñ ca śāntiṃ kuru puṣṭiṃ kuru paśyaṃ kuru
SA25n2908:330: mama sarvaśatrūṃ māraya māraya hrīṃ haḥ phaṭ svāhā| mahāmantrānusāriṇibaliḥ|
SA25n2908:332: samāpta| namo bhagavate siddhi siddhe mocani mokṣani muktre amale vimale
SA25n2908:333: nirmale aṇḍare paṇḍare maṅgalaṃ| hiraṇye garbhe sarvatrāpratihate svāhā| [17]
